title: Bump version to 0.8.0
body:
This PR modifies necessary documentation to use the verson 0.8.0. We will use this commit to publish the version.

Note that `Cargo.toml` was already changed to 0.8.0.

Signed-off-by: Breezewish <me@breeswish.org>

title: Add LocalMetric trait
body: Add a LocalMetric trait for reason discussed in https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/6163

title: Update copyright header
body:
Update our license.

See https://github.com/tikv/grpc-rs/pull/404 https://github.com/tikv/grpc-rs/pull/402

title: Switch from procinfo to procfs
body:
This commit doesn't add any new features, but allows future commits to
use features in procfs that are missing from procinfo.  Also hopefully rust-prometheus won't have to maintain as much code to deal with process info.

The idea for this change came from @brndnmtthws, who wanted to use some features in procfs that are missing from procinfo.  I haven't added these features yet, but if this PR is accepted, I can help with that work too.   Disclaimer: I am the author of the procfs crate.

Closes #272

title: Update syn, quote, proc-macro2 to v1.0
body:
Signed-off-by: koushiro <koushiro.cqx@gmail.com>

I think it's time to update `syn`, `quote` and `proc-macro2` to v1.0.
`syn`, `quote` and `proc-macro2` in the upstream dependency of `rust-prometheus` have been upgraded to version 1.0.

title: accept 200 response code when pushing to pushgateway
Add accessor for histogram
body:
add public accessor for histogram so that monitored server can access history data on local end.

Signed-off-by: tabokie <xy.tao@outlook.com>

title: Use thiserror instead of quick-error
body:
Signed-off-by: koushiro <koushiro.cqx@gmail.com>

- Use failure instead of quick-error
- Fix some typos
- Reorder some import

title: gauge: apply rustfmt
body:
This applies `rustfmt` to the whole project.

Signed-off-by: Luca BRUNO <luca.bruno@coreos.com>

title: Fix push feature dependencies
body:
It seems to require protobuf.

Fixes #277.

title: histogram: avoid accumulating error in linear buckets
body:
The logic behind linear buckets is prone to accumulate error.
This tweaks the implementation to avoid that. It multiplies
by integer step for each iteration, resulting in better behaved
buckets.

Ref: https://github.com/pingcap/rust-prometheus/pull/266
Co-Developed-by: Simonas Kazlauskas <git@kazlauskas.me>
Signed-off-by: Luca Bruno <luca.bruno@coreos.com>

title: export local inner macros for rust2018 use
Update spin dependency to 0.5.2
body:
A vulnerability was fixed in spin and is reported by cargo-audit. Although exploitation sounds unlikely, the warning shows up transitively for packages that depend on rust-prometheus, so updating it would be nice.

   https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2019-0013.html

title: Wrap timespec with struct to implement fmt::Debug.
Fix compile on nightly.
body:
LocalHistogramTimer::new_coarse() should take a local histogram as an
arg.

title: Fix bug in global label handling.
body:
There was a bug in the label handling where every metric after the first
did not have labels applied.

We were calling Vec::append() with a mutable vec as the argument, and
doing so causes the elements to change ownership from the source to the
target vec.

This change fixes the problem by cloning the label vec and introducing a
test.

title: Update Syn
body:
Also fixes a compile issue with the `nightly` feature and updates procinfo to use the same fork as TiKV.

PTAL @breeswish  @Hoverbear
